tool.name: qiime2 feature-classifier classify-sklearn

param.name: reads
param.label: reads: FeatureData[Sequence]
param.help: [required] The feature data to be classified.

param.name: classifier
param.label: classifier: TaxonomicClassifier
param.help: [required] The taxonomic classifier for classifying the reads.

param.name: __q2galaxy__GUI__select__
param.label: reads_per_batch: Int % Range(1, None) | Str % Choices('auto')
param.help: [default: 'auto'] Number of reads to process in each batch. If "auto", this parameter is autoscaled to min( number of query sequences / n_jobs, 20000).

param.name: reads_per_batch
param.label: reads_per_batch: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [required] Number of reads to process in each batch. If "auto", this parameter is autoscaled to min( number of query sequences / n_jobs, 20000).

param.name: n_jobs
param.label: n_jobs: Int
param.help: [default: 1] The maximum number of concurrently worker processes. If -1 all CPUs are used. If 1 is given, no parallel computing code is used at all, which is useful for debugging. For n_jobs below -1, (n_cpus + 1 + n_jobs) are used. Thus for n_jobs = -2, all CPUs but one are used.

param.name: pre_dispatch
param.label: pre_dispatch: Str
param.help: [default: '2*n_jobs'] "all" or expression, as in "3*n_jobs". The number of batches (of tasks) to be pre-dispatched.

param.name: __q2galaxy__GUI__select__
param.label: confidence: Float % Range(0, 1, inclusive_end=True) | Str % Choices('disable')
param.help: [default: 0.7] Confidence threshold for limiting taxonomic depth. Set to "disable" to disable confidence calculation, or 0 to calculate confidence but not apply it to limit the taxonomic depth of the assignments.

param.name: confidence
param.label: confidence: Float % Range(0, 1, inclusive_end=True)
param.help: [default: 0.7] Confidence threshold for limiting taxonomic depth. Set to "disable" to disable confidence calculation, or 0 to calculate confidence but not apply it to limit the taxonomic depth of the assignments.

param.name: read_orientation
param.label: read_orientation: Str % Choices('same', 'reverse-complement', 'auto')
param.help: [default: 'auto'] Direction of reads with respect to reference sequences. same will cause reads to be classified unchanged; reverse-complement will cause reads to be reversed and complemented prior to classification. "auto" will autodetect orientation based on the confidence estimates for the first 100 reads.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: feature-classifier classify-sklearn ============================================ Pre-fitted sklearn-based taxonomy classifier
Outputs: -------- :classification.qza: <no description>
|
Description: ------------ Classify reads by taxon using a fitted classifier.
|
